title.en: From an Evil Daughter to the Group’s Favorite?!

description.en: While binge-watching a popular drama, Ningxuan unexpectedly transmigrated into the drama's universe. She was the evil, arrogant fake daughter now, who relentlessly bullied the real daughter and kept causing trouble for herself. Whenever she thought of the terrible fate in store for her..."This is bad, this is a huge problem," Ningxuan said anxiously.To avoid this fate, Ningxuan returned everything to the true daughter and even avoided conflict with the main cast at all costs to live her life in peace. And yet—"I was wrong about you. If it's possible, can we start over?" The male lead said.Ningxuan responded, "What the heck? Bro, your true love is over there!""Since the day you rescued me, my life has belonged to you..." The male supporting character answered."Wake up! She's your savior, not me!" Ningxuan retorted. The female lead exclaimed, "I know you're the only person who treats me well in this world, so...once I get rid of all these men bothering you, you'll be mine!"
description.zh-hk: 宁萱追剧时意外穿越到剧中，成了那个欺凌真千金女主、不停作死嚣张恶毒的假千金。 想到未来的惨死命运…… 宁萱：这个要慌，问题很大。 为了避免惨死的命运，宁萱把一切都还给了真千金，还兢兢业业的避免和主角团对着干，小心翼翼的苟命，然而—— 男一：我之前看错了你，如果可以，我们能重新开始吗？ 宁萱：啥玩意?大哥你的真命天女在那边呢！ 男二：从你救了我的那一天开始，我的生命就属于你…… 宁萱：你清醒一点!救你的人是她不是我啊！ 女一：我知道，这世上只有你真心待我，所以……那些男人死了，你就属于我了！ 宁萱：哈？？？!!!!!

biography.en: A John Doe name used by Bilibili Comics ENG.
A John Doe name used by Bilibili Comics ENG.
